welcome_message_body: Welcome to Giza, home to the iconic Great Sphinx and the stunning pyramids. We hope you enjoy exploring the rich history and charm of our city. Embrace the beauty and wonder of Giza during your visit!

restaurants.name: The Platform
restaurants.description: The Platform is a food court located in Maadi Cornish.
restaurants.address: Corniche El Maadi, Maadi Cornish, القاهرة

restaurants.name: The Roof
restaurants.description: The Roof is a café located in الجيزة.
restaurants.address: SunSet Boat - 139 Nile St (In front of Four Seasons), الجيزة, محافظة الجيزة

restaurants.name: Antar El Kababgy (عنتر الكبابجي)
restaurants.description: Antar El Kababgy (عنتر الكبابجي) is a kebab restaurant located in روضة جزيره.
restaurants.address: 40 El Manial St, روضة جزيره, القاهرة

restaurants.name: La Gourmandise at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence
restaurants.description: La Gourmandise at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence is a french restaurant located in الجيزة.
restaurants.address: Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at First Residence (Mourad Street), الجيزة, محافظة الجيزة, 12311

restaurants.name: Aura
restaurants.description: Aura is a lebanese restaurant located in Cairo.
restaurants.address: Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at First Residence (Mourad Street), Cairo, محافظة الجيزة, 12311

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Used for domestic and regional flights

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Newly opened terminal for international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sphinx International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sphinx International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
